title: Support AZ DLCC
description: Help elect Democrats in the AZ House and Senate.
report: Help Democrats gain the majority in 2022. Republicans control both chambers of the AZ state legislature, but we're here to change that. Click on the link above and sign up today. Join us-The work for 2020 has already begun.

title: Support Mark Kelly
description: Be Part of a Virtual Reception
report: Join us for a virtual reception with Mark Kelly Democratic candidate for U.S Senate on Tues, Sept 8th, 5:00-6:00 PM AZ Time. We will send a second Democratic Senator to Congress when we help to elect Mark Kelly. Click on the link above.

title: VOTE
report: Call your family and friends and help them to vote the Democratic ballot. Do they need a ride to the polls? Help finding a polling place? Every VOTE matters in this election!

title: Request to Speak
report: We need AZ legislators to hear our voices! Request to Speak (RTS) is easy and quick. Next training is Thurs Jan 14 at 5:30pm to find out about RTS and learn how to navigate the system. We'll be there to show you how. Click on the link above for more information.

title: Commit to Your LD
description: Re-connect with your new Legislative District.
report: Commit for 2022 to connect with your LD. Attend the monthly meetings and get involved. We need to make 2022 happen! Click on the link above and find your LD. Then, Google for your LD website to find the monthly meeting dates and how you can help. All LDs have many opportunities for volunteering.

title: ActNowAZ April 23rd
description: Must-hear from Democratic Candidates and Speakers
report: Join us on Sat April 23 at 4pm-6pm to Learn, Energize, Take Specific Actions to elect Democrats in 2022. Speakers include Dr. Eric Meyer, ADLCC; Laura Terech, Our Candidate for State Rep L4; Christine Marsh, Our Candidate for State Senate LD4; Raquel Teran, ADP Chairperson; Mayor Kate Gallego; Nancy Schriber, MCDP Chairperson.Email caren.siehl@me.com for more information.

title: LD4 Campaign Kickoff March 27
description: Support Christine Marsh and Laura Terech
report: Join us to kick off the re-election campaign of State Senator Christine Porter Marsh LD4 and the campaign of Laura Terech for LD4 State House on Sun March 27, 4-6pm. Click on the link above to RSVP.

title: ActNowAZ April 23rd-Join us!
description: Must-hear from Democratic Candidates and Speakers
report: Join us on Sat April 23 at 4pm-6pm to Learn, Energize, Take Specific Actions to elect Democrats in 2022. Speakers include Julie Gunnigle for MC Attorney; Dr. Eric Meyer, ADLCC; Laura Terech, Our Candidate for State Rep L4; Christine Marsh, Our Candidate for State Senate LD4; Raquel Teran, ADP Chairperson; Mayor Kate Gallego; Nancy Schriber, MCDP Chairperson. Email caren.siehl@me.com for more information.

title: May 21st Canvass-Join us!
description: Must win LD4 needs our help
report: Join us on May 21st at 9am in Altadena Park to talk to our neighbors about this election and our two pro-choice legislative candidates, State Senator Christine Marsh and State House candidate Laura Terech! If you've never canvassed before or are looking to get back in the swing of it, this is a great time to start! Sign up on the link above. We will win by giving time!

title: Write Postcards
report: Is postcard writing your cup of tea? Sign up to work on a special CEBV project writing postcards to AZ voters in swing districts! Click on the link to get started!

title: Write Postcards
report: Write postcards with like-minded friends reminding people to vote, thanking them for signing petitions, and providing other key information. Together we can work to solve our state's problems.Join us on Mondays at the LD4 Democrats office from 1-3pm. Click on the link to get started!

title: ActNowAZ
description: Click here for a simple explanation of how the ActNowAZ App works!
report: Every Tuesday, your iPhone or iPad will ping with a notification of a specific way that we can help to deliver for Democrats in 2020. Open the App and you will have your action for the week. And, the actions and ideas for previous weeks will remain open, so check them out, too. Join us and make your voice heard and your actions matter.
